title: Chiefs-Patriots Preview and the Teams No One Is Talking About | The Ringer NFL Show (Ep. 320)
description:
The Ringer’s Robert Mays and Kevin Clark link up to discuss the three teams no one is talking about now, but will be in three weeks (1:00) before workshopping some hot takes about the Chiefs-Patriots game in this week's "Take Shop" (22:00). Then the guys preview the biggest games heading into Week 6, and Brandon Thorn of USA Football calls in to talk about David Bakhtiari and the Packers offense (31:30).

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
